description: READY: Hazards Mapping and Assessment for Effective Community Based Disaster Risk Management (READY PHASE II)

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: Multihazard identification and disaster risk assessment. Provincial hazard maps at 1:50 000 scale and municipal maps of 1:10 000 scale (Flood/Flashflood and Rain-Induced Landslide Susceptibility maps) are to be procued for target provinces.
subproject.title: READY II Multi Hazard Mapping

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: Multihazard identification and disaster risk assessment. Provincial hazard maps at 1:50 000 scale and municipal maps of 1:10 000 scale (Flood/Flashflood and Rain-Induced Landslide Susceptibility maps) are to be procued for target provinces.
subproject.title: READY II Multi Hazard Mapping

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: Mainstreaming Disaster Risk Reduction through (1) Mainstreaming Risk Reduction into the Local Development Plans, (2) Strengthening NDCC-OCD and (3) Capacity building of LGUs through provision of REDAS Software and training.
subproject.title: READY II Mainstreaming DRR

title: Multi Hazard Mapping and Community Disaster Preparation
